GetClassType.name: GetClassType
GetClassType.description: Returns a type of the ApiContentControlListEntry class.

GetParent.name: GetParent
GetParent.description: Returns a parent of the content control list item in the combo box / dropdown list content control.

Select.name: Select
Select.description: Selects the list entry in the combo box / dropdown list content control and sets the text of the content control to the selected item value.

MoveUp.name: MoveUp
MoveUp.description: Moves the current item in the parent combo box / dropdown list content control up one element.

MoveDown.name: MoveDown
MoveDown.description: Moves the current item in the parent combo box / dropdown list content control down one element, so that it is after the item that originally followed it.

GetIndex.name: GetIndex
GetIndex.description: Returns an index of the content control list item in the combo box / dropdown list content control.

SetIndex.name: SetIndex
SetIndex.description: Sets an index to the content control list item in the combo box / dropdown list content control.

params.name: nIndex
params.description: An index of the content control list item.

Delete.name: Delete
Delete.description: Deletes the specified item in the combo box / dropdown list content control.

GetText.name: GetText
GetText.description: Returns a String that represents the display text of a list item for the combo box / dropdown list content control.

SetText.name: SetText
SetText.description: Sets a String that represents the display text of a list item for the combo box / dropdown list content control.

params.name: sText
params.description: The display text of a list item.

GetValue.name: GetValue
GetValue.description: Returns a String that represents the value of a list item for the combo box / dropdown list content control.

SetValue.name: SetValue
SetValue.description: Sets a String that represents the value of a list item for the combo box / dropdown list content control.

comment:
/**
	 * Class representing an entry of the combo box / dropdown list content control.
	 * @constructor
	 */
description: Class representing an entry of the combo box / dropdown list content control.
